price: Bila ya shaka tumemuumba mtu kwa umbo lilio bora kabisa.
arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
footnotes: Kwa hakika bila ya shaka yoyote Sisi tumemuumba mtu amesimama sawa kwa umbo bora kabisa lilio nyooka, na akasifika kwa sifa nzuri kabisa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: laqad khalaqnā al-insāna fī aḥsani taqwīmin
